SELECT n.nspname as "Schema", c.relname as "Name", CASE c.relkind WHEN 'r' THEN 'table' WHEN 'v' THEN 'view' WHEN 'm' THEN 'materialized view' WHEN 'i' THEN 'index' WHEN 'S' THEN 'sequence' WHEN 's' THEN 'special' WHEN 'f' THEN 'foreign table' WHEN 'p' THEN 'partitioned table' WHEN 'I' THEN 'partitioned index' END as "Type", pg_catalog.pg_get_userbyid(c.relowner) as "Owner" FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c LEFT JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace WHERE c.relkind IN ('r','p','v','m','S','f','') AND n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' AND n.nspname <> 'information_schema' AND n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT n.nspname as "Schema", c.relname as "Name", CASE c.relkind WHEN 'r' THEN 'table' WHEN 'v' THEN 'view' WHEN 'i' THEN 'index' WHEN 'I' THEN 'global partition index' WHEN 'S' THEN 'sequence' WHEN 'L' THEN 'large sequence' WHEN 'f' THEN 'foreign table' WHEN 'm' THEN 'materialized view' WHEN 'e' THEN 'stream' WHEN 'o' THEN 'contview' END as "Type", pg_catalog.pg_get_userbyid(c.relowner) as "Owner", c.reloptions as "Storage" FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c LEFT JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace WHERE c.relkind IN ('r','v','m','S','L','f','e','o','') AND n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' AND n.nspname <> 'db4ai' AND n.nspname <> 'information_schema' AND n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' AND c.relname not like 'matviewmap\_%' AND c.relname not like 'mlog\_%' AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) ORDER BY 1,2;
